step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Excellent! Ensure your arm remains straight overhead throughout the movement.
Great job opening your hand and fingers wide. Keep that stretch.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to keep your arm extended overhead.
Good continuation. Maintain the straight arm position and focus on the stretch.
Nicely done opening your hand wide again. Keep the effort consistent.
Fantastic finish! You made a tight fist while inhaling. Great work overall.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling. Keep up the good work promoting lymph flow!
